column5: In need of a new battery for my unit and wondering if there is anywhere around the guelph area that would sell them.  Thanks
radioworld has them. 35 dollars i believe. might be worth the drive.
There is a battery place in hamilton that has them for about $20 i believe..not sure of the name.
I know not Guelph but LeBaron's are about $30
I've been using these guys for a few years now. Last time I ordered it was there the next day. No complaints.  Total Battery
x 2 these didn't cost me a cent and i got 10 of the 35 amp/hr ones
Well, didn't you score big, that's handy, I've still got a 7A one that has to be around 20 years old, date stamp of 32/89, still has enough to power the F/F for a couple days.
Best I've got so far are the 9ah batteries out of APC computer back up supplies. Exact same size as the 7ah...
if you are going to buy one the 9ah is a better battery for the price
